name: Heavy Shock Baton
description: Like the Shock Baton image generated previously, but of higher quality. Industrial security baton capable of stunning cybernetic brutes and armored enforcers alike.

name: Legendary Monofilament Whip
description: Like the Monofilament Whip image generated previously, but of higher quality. The apex of weaponized filaments, capable of cutting through armor, steel, or reality itself.

name: Diamond Cyber Spurs
description: Like the Cyber Spur image generated previously, but of higher quality. Mirror-finish diamond-tipped spurs designed for surgical precision and absolute silence.

name: Thunder Baton
description: Like the Shock Baton image generated previously, but of higher quality. Electrified shock weapon tuned for area suppression, discharging arcs of blinding light and sound.
